de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class CircleRevealAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DialogAnimation
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.CircleRevealAnimation

  • public class CircleRevealAnimation
extends DialogAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size as a clipping circle.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CircleRevealAnimation.Builder
      A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size as a clipping circle.

      • CircleRevealAnimation

        protected CircleRevealAnimation(@NonNull
                                android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new animation, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size as a clipping circle.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the animation, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

        Sets the radius, which should be used by the animation.
